name: Ryppl Feeds
body:
### Welcome to the [Ryppl](http://ryppl.org) feed repository.

Ryppl uses an amazing technology called [Zero Install](http://0install.net).  This is where we're hosting the [feed files](http://0install.net/injector-packagers.html).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
